items.title: EU, Spain brush off Trump tariff threats over Madrid's defence spending
items.summary: MADRID (Reuters) -The European Commission and Spain's government on Monday dismissed U.S. President Donald Trump's latest threat to impose higher tariffs on Madrid over its refusal to meet his proposed NATO target for defence spending.  Read full story

items.title: Save a total $1,116 on Tenways’ AGO X all-terrain mid-drive e-bike with FREE gear and 180Wh power bank at $1,999
items.summary:
Tenways is offering a special extra battery promotion (known as the Tenways Power Bank here) on its AGO X All-Terrain e-bike at $1,999 shipped that also comes with $307 in FREE additional add-on gear, while also offering a 50% discount on the standalone power bank, were you wanting to pick one up for any other models from the brand you may already have. The AGO X e-bike normally goes for $2,499 without discounts, which we’ve mostly seen taken down to this rate over the year, with some occasional drops lower to $1,899. This is the first bundle with the Tenways Power Bank ($309 value), however, giving you a total of $1,116 savings, which is the biggest deal we’ve tracked to date. Alongside this model, you can also find the CGO600 Pro Lightweight e-bikes with $300 price cuts and $118 in FREE gear, as well as the option for a 50% off Power Bank add-on.

more…

items.title: Threads is getting group chats as messaging rolls out to the EU
items.summary: Instagram Threads is rolling out group messaging for up to 50 people and expanding its direct messaging features to users in the EU. The update lets users 18 and older share text, videos, GIFs, and emojis in group chats, though messages aren’t encrypted

items.title: Giant $850 knocks Samsung’s 57-inch Odyssey Neo G9 Mini-LED curved gaming monitor down to its lowest price of the year
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Samsung that gets you its Odyssey Neo G9 57-inch Mini-LED curved gaming monitor for $1,449.99 shipped. Originally priced at $2,500, this stunning curved gaming monitor has recently been selling for around $2,300. However, today’s Samsung deal – which includes a $50 upgrade credit – knocks a full $850 off its regular price, bringing it down to one of the lowest prices we’ve seen for this model. This marks the return of the lowest price we’ve seen for this display all year, coming in $50 cheaper than the current discounts at Amazon, Best Buy, and B&H. That extra $50 in savings could easily go toward another accessory for your gaming setup, so be sure to cash in now after getting more details below.

It’ll normally go for $1,299 at full price once these initial launch savings end, with the discount today starting things at $799, while our readers score a bonus $64 price cut further. items.title: A survey of 28K+ adults in 25 countries on AI: 81% have heard a lot or a little, 34% are more concerned than excited, and 42% are equally concerned and excited (Pew Research Center)

items.title: Originally $100 3-in-1 charging cube for your entire Apple kit is down to just $22.50 today
items.summary:
LISEN 3-in-1 wireless charging cube

Buy for $23 (Reg. $40+)

Clip the on-page 43% off coupon.

What we love

This compact, foldable charging station lets you power your entire Apple setup at once, and it folds into a neat cube for easy storage when not in use. It offers three dedicated wireless spots – for your iPhone, AirPods, and Apple Watch – delivering up to 7.5W for the iPhone and 2.5W each for the AirPods and Apple Watch. While it’s not the fastest charger out there, its space-saving design and affordable price make it a standout choice.

items.title: If you somehow don’t have a copy of Super Mario 3D World + Bowser’s Fury, it’s now 34% off at Amazon
items.summary:
Alongside some hangover Prime Day PS5 and Switch game deals below, we also spotted a rare discount on digital copies of Super Mario 3D World + Bowser’s Fury at Amazon down at $39.88 – this deal is also matched at Walmart. Regularly $60, you’re looking at 34% in savings and price that undercuts the $44.99 we have been tracking on physical copies at Woot for quite some time now (this is the lowest price we can find for a boxed copy right now). While this is obviously not a new Mario release, it is the definitive version of the game and still a wonderful play through with the bonus Bowser’s Fury experience tacked on – it is almost like a game of its own. Every Switch gamer should have a copy of this one id you ask me, and now’s your chance to do so.

Update: INIU’s 10,000mAh power bank with lanyard USB-C cable is now going for even less at $16.82 Prime shipped with a 49% discount that auto-applies during checkout. More details in the original post below.

Over at Amazon, you’ll find INIU’s official storefront offering its compact 10,000mAh power bank with a lanyard USB-C cable for $18.10 Prime shipped, with a $15 coupon that auto-applies during checkout. Folks without a Prime membership can checkout with items worth over $35 in the cart. This is regularly a $33 unit, which is now seeing a $15 discount. It dropped to the $28 mark during the fall Prime Day sale earlier this month, but today’s deal shaves an additional $10 off that price to mark a new best price to beat. Head below for more details.

items.title: Originally $350 Samsung Odyssey G4 25-inch 240Hz FHD gaming monitor is down to $149 today
items.summary:
Over at Walmart, you’ll find Samsung’s Odyssey 25-inch IPS FHD Odyssey G4 gaming monitor listed for $149 shipped. This is originally a $350 unit that has fetched as much as $280 in recent months. Walmart’s 46% discount today, however, shaves $131 off its usual going rate to mark a new best price to beat. For comparison, both Amazon and Samsung are selling the same model for $200, meaning Walmart’s offer undercuts them by $51. Meanwhile, Best Buy has the 27-inch version at $300, which comes with some bonuses like a 1-month Discord Nitro subscription and up to 25% off select Logitech gear when bundled. Head below for more details.
